verses.verse: <S%H121>Adam,<s%> <S%H8352>Seth,<s%> <S%H583>Enosh,<s%>
<S%H7018>Kenan,<s%> <S%H4111>Mahalalel,<s%> <S%H3382>Jared,<s%>
<S%H2585>Enoch,<s%> <S%H4968>Methuselah,<s%> <S%H3929>Lamech,<s%>
<S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3315>Japheth:<s%> <S%H1586>Gomer,<s%> and <S%H4031>Magog,<s%> and <S%H4074>Madai,<s%> and <S%H3120>Javan,<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> and <S%H8494>Tiras.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1586>Gomer:<s%> <S%H813>Ashkenaz,<s%> and <S%H7384>Diphath,<s%> and <S%H8425>Togarmah.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3120>Javan:<s%> <S%H473>Elishah,<s%> and <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H3794>Kittim,<s%> and <S%H1721>Rodanim.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham:<s%> <S%H3568>Cush,<s%> and <S%H4714>Mizraim,<s%> <S%H6316>Put,<s%> and <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush:<s%> <S%H5434>Seba,<s%> and <S%H2341>Havilah,<s%> and <S%H5454>Sabta,<s%> and <S%H7484>Raama,<s%> and <S%H5455>Sabteca.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7484>Raamah:<s%> <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan.<s%>
<S%H3568>Cush<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5248>Nimrod;<s%> he <S%H2490>began<s%> to be a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> one in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H4714>Mizraim<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3866>Ludim,<s%> and <S%H6047>Anamim,<s%> and <S%H3853>Lehabim,<s%> and <S%H5320>Naphtuhim,<s%>
and <S%H6625>Pathrusim,<s%> and <S%H3695>Casluhim<s%> (where the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3732>from<s%>), and Caphtorim.
<S%H3667>Canaan<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and <S%H2845>Heth,<s%>
and the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashite,<s%>
and the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H6208>Arkite,<s%> and the <S%H5513>Sinite,<s%>
and the <S%H721>Arvadite,<s%> and the <S%H6786>Zemarite,<s%> and the <S%H2577>Hamathite.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem:<s%> <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and <S%H804>Asshur,<s%> and <S%H775>Arpachshad,<s%> and <S%H3865>Lud,<s%> and <S%H758>Aram,<s%> and <S%H5780>Uz,<s%> and <S%H2343>Hul,<s%> and <S%H1666>Gether,<s%> and <S%H4902>Meshech.<s%>
<S%H775>Arpachshad<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7974>Shelah,<s%> and <S%H7974>Shelah<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5677>Eber.<s%>

To <S%H5677>Eber<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons:<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H6389>Peleg;<s%> for in his <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H6385>divided;<s%> and his <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3355>Joktan.<s%>
<S%H3355>Joktan<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H486>Almodad,<s%> and <S%H8026>Sheleph,<s%> and <S%H2700>Hazarmaveth,<s%> and <S%H3392>Jerah,<s%>
and <S%H1913>Hadoram,<s%> and <S%H187>Uzal,<s%> and <S%H1853>Diklah,<s%>
and <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%> and <S%H39>Abimael,<s%> and <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%>
and <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> and <S%H2341>Havilah,<s%> and <S%H3103>Jobab.<s%> All these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3355>Joktan.<s%>
<S%H8035>Shem,<s%> <S%H775>Arpachshad,<s%> <S%H7974>Shelah,<s%>
<S%H8286>Serug,<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> <S%H8646>Terah,<s%>
<S%H87>Abram<s%> (the same is <S%H85>Abraham<s%>).
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham:<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael.<s%>
These are their <S%H8435>generations:<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H5032>Nebaioth;<s%> then <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> and <S%H110>Adbeel,<s%> and <S%H4017>Mibsam,<s%>
<S%H4927>Mishma,<s%> and <S%H1746>Dumah,<s%> <S%H4854>Massa,<s%> <S%H2301>Hadad,<s%> and <S%H8485>Tema,<s%>
<S%H3195>Jetur,<s%> <S%H5305>Naphish,<s%> and <S%H6929>Kedemah.<s%> These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6989>Keturah,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H6370>concubine:<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H2175>Zimran,<s%> and <S%H3370>Jokshan,<s%> and <S%H4091>Medan,<s%> and <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H3435>Ishbak,<s%> and <S%H7744>Shuah.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3370>Jokshan:<s%> <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian:<s%> <S%H5891>Ephah,<s%> and <S%H6081>Epher,<s%> and <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> and <S%H28>Abida,<s%> and <S%H420>Eldaah.<s%> All these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6989>Keturah.<s%>
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac:<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau:<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz,<s%> <S%H7467>Reuel,<s%> and <S%H3266>Jeush,<s%> and <S%H3281>Jalam,<s%> and <S%H7141>Korah.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H464>Eliphaz:<s%> <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> and <S%H201>Omar,<s%> <S%H6825>Zephi,<s%> and <S%H1609>Gatam,<s%> <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> and <S%H8555>Timna,<s%> and <S%H6002>Amalek.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel:<s%> <S%H5184>Nahath,<s%> <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah,<s%> and <S%H4199>Mizzah.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir:<s%> <S%H3877>Lotan,<s%> and <S%H7732>Shobal,<s%> and <S%H6649>Zibeon,<s%> and <S%H6034>Anah,<s%> and <S%H1787>Dishon,<s%> and <S%H687>Ezer,<s%> and <S%H1789>Dishan.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3877>Lotan:<s%> <S%H2753>Hori,<s%> and <S%H1950>Homam;<s%> and <S%H8555>Timna<s%> was <S%H3877>Lotan<s%>'s <S%H269>sister.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7732>Shobal:<s%> <S%H5935>Alian,<s%> and <S%H4506>Manahath,<s%> and <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%> <S%H8195>Shephi,<s%> and <S%H208>Onam.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon:<s%> <S%H345>Aiah,<s%> and <S%H6034>Anah.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah:<s%> <S%H1787>Dishon.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1787>Dishon:<s%> <S%H2566>Hamran,<s%> and <S%H790>Eshban,<s%> and <S%H3506>Ithran,<s%> and <S%H3763>Cheran.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H687>Ezer:<s%> <S%H1092>Bilhan,<s%> and <S%H2190>Zaavan,<s%> <S%H3292>Jaakan.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1789>Dishan:<s%> <S%H5780>Uz,<s%> and <S%H765>Aran.<s%>

Now these are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> who <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> there <S%H4427>reigned<s%> any <S%H4428>king<s%> over the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H1106>Bela<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H1838>Dinhabah.<s%>
<S%H1106>Bela<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> of <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
<S%H3103>Jobab<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H2367>Husham<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H8489>Temanites<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

<S%H2367>Husham<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H911>Bedad,<s%> who <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8034>place;<s%> and the name of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5762>Avith.<s%>
<S%H1908>Hadad<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H8072>Samlah<s%> of <S%H4957>Masrekah<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
<S%H8072>Samlah<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> of <S%H7344>Rehoboth<s%> by the <S%H5104>River<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
<S%H7586>Shaul<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and Baal <S%H1177>Hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

Baal <S%H1177>Hanan<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8034>place;<s%> and the name of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H6464>Pai:<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4105>Mehetabel,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4308>Matred,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4314>Mezahab.<s%>

<S%H1908>Hadad<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%> The <S%H441>chiefs<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H441>were:<s%> chief <S%H8555>Timna,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H5933>Aliah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H3509>Jetheth,<s%>
<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H173>Oholibamah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H425>Elah,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H6373>Pinon,<s%>
<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H4014>Mibzar,<s%>
<S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H4025>Magdiel,<s%> <S%H441>chief<s%> <S%H5902>Iram.<s%> These are the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>
